webinars.title: WebinarBest Practices for qPCR and dPCR Assays in Cell and Gene Therapy DevelopmentIn this webinar, our expert speaker will share insights on optimizing PCR performance for applications within cell and gene therapy development, including biodistribution, transgene expression, viral shedding and cellular kinetics.
webinars.description: Technology Networks webinar: WebinarBest Practices for qPCR and dPCR Assays in Cell and Gene Therapy DevelopmentIn this webinar, our expert speaker will share insights on optimizing PCR performance for applications within cell and gene therapy development, including biodistribution, transgene expression, viral shedding and cellular kinetics.

webinars.title: WebinarAdvanced Strategies for Effective mRNA Transfection in T CellsOn-DemandThis session will delve into the latest strategies and technologies that maximize transfection efficiency, cell proliferation and cytotoxic activity against cancer cells.
webinars.description: Technology Networks webinar: WebinarAdvanced Strategies for Effective mRNA Transfection in T CellsOn-DemandThis session will delve into the latest strategies and technologies that maximize transfection efficiency, cell proliferation and cytotoxic activity against cancer cells.

webinars.title: WebinarEnhancing Gene Therapy With Precise AAV Capsid AnalysisOn-DemandIn this webinar, Dr. Chelsea Pratt will explore the field of gene therapy, highlighting key challenges and the predominant current techniques.

webinars.title: WebinarEpisode 4: T Cell Therapy Development With the Seahorse XF Pro SolutionOn-DemandThis webinar presents an optimized assay workflow using the Agilent Seahorse XF Pro Analyzer to profile T cell energy metabolism, enhancing the design and manufacturing of CAR-T cell therapies.
